mapper.select: select distinct t2.id, t2.menu_name as menuName, t2.menu_url as menuUrl, t2.parent_id as parentId, t2.is_dir as isDir, t2.sort, t2.creator, t2.create_time as createTime, t2.`status` from tb_sys_permission_menu t1 , tb_sys_menu t2 where t1.menu_id = t2.id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t1.permission_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select DISTINCT t.id, t.menu_name as menuName from tb_sys_menu t left join (select t1.id from tb_sys_menu t1,tb_sys_permission_menu t2 where t1.id = t2.menu_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t2.permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tt on t.id = tt.id where t.`status` = '1' and tt.id is null
and t.menu_name like CONCAT('%', #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
